module.name: DUNDi Lookup Registry
module.changelog: *2.11.0.3* Include license file *2.11.0.1* Label class can not be used in FreePBX 2.10 *2.11.0.0* bump version *2.10.0.1* #5478 *2.10.0.0* new version changes *2.9.0.1* set repo *2.9.0.0* 2.9 Update
module.description: This module will check all configured and enabled DUNDi trunks as part of the extension registry function, and report back conflicts if other sites have the same extensions. This does not filter against the route patterns - it will take any number being created and report a conflict if that trunk could be used to call that number.
